compounddef.title: DesignWare IIC Driver Function API Implement

parameterdescription.para: iic device object pointer
iic working mode (master or slave)
When mode is DEV_MASTER_MODE, param stands for speed mode, when mode is DEV_SLAVE_MODE, param stands for slave device 7bit address
Open successfully without any issues
If device was opened before with different parameters, then just increase the opn_cnt and return E_OPNED
Device object is not valid
Device is opened for different mode before, if you want to open it with different mode, you need to fully close it first.
Parameter is not valid
Open settings are not supported
iic device object pointer
Close successfully without any issues(including secenary that device is already closed)
Device is still opened, the device opn_cnt decreased by 1
Device object is not valid
iic device object pointer
control command, to change or get some thing related to iic
parameters that maybe argument of the command, or return values of the command, must not be NULL
Control device successfully
Device is not opened
Device object is not valid or not exists
Parameter is not valid for current control command
Control device failed, due to hardware issues, such as device is disabled
Control device failed, due to different reasons like in transfer state
Control command is not supported or not valid

briefdescription.para: poll transmit data through DesignWare IIC as master or slave

parameterdescription.para: iic device object pointer
data that need to send (data must be uint8_t type)
data length need to send
Byte count that was successfully sent for poll method, it might can't send that much due to different error state.
Device object is not valid or not exists
Parameter is not valid
Device is still in transfer state
Can't write data to hardware due to hardware issues, such as device is disabled
iic device object pointer
data that need to read (data must be uint8_t type)
data count need to read
Byte count that was successfully received for poll method, it might can't send that much due to different error state.
Device object is not valid or not exists
Device is still in transfer state
Parameter is not valid
Can't receive data from hardware due to hardware issues, such as device is disabled
DEV_IIC *iic_obj
extra information

briefdescription.para: implement device hal iic api with DesignWare IIC
